level.text: 9804.1 Any grievance of any decision by DCHA withespect to application, eligibility, continued occupancy or terminations underhis chapter is governed by 14 DCMR chapter 63, grievance provisions.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 2460, 2462 (March 18,011); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4346 (May0, 2011).
